dimension: 38 x 56 in. (96.52 x 142.24 cm) (cuff to cuff)
title: Jacket
description: home spun two-tone blue; overlap opening PR with 4 frogs and metal buttons; large darker blue applique circle and bands accenting neck and closure; very large 15\" wide sleeves; 27\" wide chest flaring to 34 1/2\" at bottom; all sections lined
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
